About Us

Our History

Started in 2018, Blaze Sales Group was created to represent manufacturers in the sporting goods industry with the highest of standards.

Combining a comprehensive understanding of the industry with the most current, proven marketing techniques allows us to implement marketing strategies for our clients with the needs of the end-user or consumer and the needs of the manufacturer in mind. We provide customers with superior product knowledge that is used to create effective communication strategies and enact sound marketing plans to overcome the challenges of the sporting goods industry.
